result.eng: There are plenty of shops and a supermarket there also.

result.eng: News is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.

result.eng: We need a bottle of milk also, Micí.

result.eng: But it's nice to meet new people, too.

result.eng: It's nice to meet you as well.

result.eng: I live in Cork now. - I live there as well!

result.eng: It's beside the sea but close to the city as well.

result.eng: I love going to the theatre as well.
